title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the Most Recently Used (MRU) list in the File menu do not appear after restarting the application.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions, so that they still appear after restarting the application.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the application. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the application. 4. Restart the application and check if the files still appear in the MRU list.
